title: Grademate

title: Trackmate

title: Absence Screen
description: A teacher absence management system built on an SQL-based data infrastructure</br></br>The system includes a web dashboard for administration and absence monitoring</br></br>as well as a mobile app for teachers to input and view their absences in real-time
